text: Graham William Walker (born 4 April 1963), better known by his stage name Graham Norton, is an Irish actor, comedian and television presenter. He is best known for hosting So Graham Norton (1998-2002), V Graham Norton (2002-03), The Graham Norton Effect (2004), Graham Norton's Bigger Picture (2004-05) and The Graham Norton Show (2007-present). In the United Kingdom, he is known for being the UK commentator for the Eurovision Song Contest. Norton was born in Clondalkin, Dublin and grew up in Bandon, County Cork. He comes from a Protestant family. He is openly gay. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Gay men Category:Irish LGBT people Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish stand-up comedians Category:Irish television actors Category:Irish television personalities Category:Irish television presenters Category:Actors from County Cork Category:Actors from Dublin
title: Graham Norton
